name: Design Tools
description: Tools for graphic design, UI/UX, prototyping, and creative work

tools.name: Figma
tools.description: Collaborative interface design tool for creating user interfaces, prototypes, and design systems.

tools.name: Canva
tools.description: Easy-to-use design tool for creating graphics, presentations, social media posts, and more.

tools.name: Adobe Creative Cloud
tools.description: Suite of creative applications including Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, and more.

tools.name: Sketch
tools.description: Vector graphics editor focused on user interface and user experience design.

tools.name: Framer
tools.description: Interactive design tool for creating high-fidelity prototypes and animations.

tools.name: Unsplash
tools.description: Free high-resolution photos and images for your creative projects.

tools.name: Dribbble
tools.description: Community of designers sharing screenshots of their work, process, and projects.

tools.name: InVision
tools.description: Digital product design platform for prototyping, collaboration, and design workflow.

tools.name: Coolors
tools.description: Color palette generator and color scheme explorer for designers and artists.
